alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Tippecanoe; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 9:37AM EDT until March 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River at Lafayette. .Rainfall totals from this past Friday-Saturday approaching an inch over the Upper Wabash Valley have led to minor flooding on the Wabash at Lafayette. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Lafayette. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, High water affects a few low river cabins and county roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage today to 11.2 feet tomorrow morning. It is then expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon to 10.6 feet and begin rising again Wednesday evening. It will rise above flood stage again Thursday morning and continue to rise to 11.8 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated this evening.
